attributes.action: stop Ken Livingstone from implementing the £25 congestion charge as it has no popular support
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Londoners have suffered enough from the idiocracies of Ken Livingstone. His £25 congestion charge is unfair and unpopular. It is time the people of London stood up to him and show him your opinion counts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
